narrative_title: Electric Vehicle Production Boosting Silver Usage

evidence.text: Tesla's Gigafactory expansion to increase silver consumption by 15% annually. Each EV uses approximately 25-50 grams of silver in electrical components.
IEA report: Global EV sales expected to reach 40 million units by 2030. Silver Institute projects 90 million additional ounces needed for automotive sector.
Underrated silver thesis: EV + solar + 5G all require massive silver. This decade's copper story but more supply constrained.
BYD and Chinese EV manufacturers ramp up production. Silver demand from automotive sector now second largest industrial application after solar.
Analysis: EV transition is bullish for silver. Every major automaker committed to electrification by 2030. This is guaranteed demand growth.
